# tiokhin2020

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/lubianat/tiokhin2020.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/lubianat/tiokhin2020)
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/lubianat/tiokhin2020/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/lubianat/tiokhin2020?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tiokhin2020 is to be a small package to allow testing of the code underlying 
the paper [Competition for priority and the cultural evolution of research strategies
](https://osf.io/preprints/metaarxiv/x4t7q/).

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("lubianat/tiokhin2020")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
# library(tiokhin2020)
## basic example code
```
